about.title: Few Words About Me
about.text:
Hello there! My name is Karolina and I'm a passionate front-end developer with several years of experience in the field. From sunny Bologna in Italy, I recently relocated to Bergen in Norway to pursue new opportunities in the IT industry.
     Throughout my career, I've had many opportunities to work on a diverse range of web development projects, including building modern, user-friendly websites and engaging web applications. I possess a deep understanding of front-end development technologies and I know the basics of back-end and design, which allows me to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
     I'm always looking to enhance my workflow and deliver the best possible results, which is why I stay up to date with the latest tools and frameworks in the industry. Whether it is building a responsive website from scratch or optimizing an existing app, I always strive for excellence and attention to detail.
One of the things I enjoy most about web development is collaborating with other developers to create functional and visually appealing products. I believe that working together to achieve a shared goal is essential for success in any project.
     I'm also committed to continuous learning and personal growth, and I'm eager to take on new challenges to expand my skills. My goal is to become a full-stack developer and continue my journey in the IT industry. So, if you are looking for a dedicated front-end developer to help you bring your projects to life, please get in touch!

projectPage.title: Projects
projectPage.subtitle: During my professional career as a front-end developer, I participated in interesting and exiting projects. I'm thrilled to showcase some of my works, including projects that I've completed both as a part of a team and individually. Please take a moment to explore my portfolio and feel free to contact me if you have any questions or feedback. I look forward to discussing my work with you!

technologiesPage.title: Technologies
technologiesPage.subtitle: At the heart of my technology stack lies React.js - a popular and powerful framework allowing me to create responsive and complex user interfaces with ease. In addition, I am using a variety of other cutting-edge technologies that work very well with React.js.

contactPage.subtitle: Thank you for stopping by my portfolio! If you're interested in discussing a project, collaborating, or just have a question, please don't hesitate to contact me :-).
